channel.title: Personal on Ádám Urbán
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Ádám Urbán

item.title: Home
item.description: Welcome, my name is Ádám Urbán I am passionate about STEM, Hardware, Software and Coding. My journey started as a boy who won the 8th grade Physics olympiad in my elementary school. I also competed in the FLL competition and later in the RoboCup competition. Currently I am a 1st year Electronic and Information Engineering Student @ Imperial College London. Please see my full CV site here. For EIE students: Read more about my work as your Year Academic Representative.
